names.headline: How would you like to call your players?

cardType.headline: What type of cards would you like to play with?

aside.instruction:
To start a game choose one of the available cards. The player with the highest value of the determining attribute wins the round. For people determing attribute is [mass], for starships [crew]. The game ends when both players select cards. The player with the highest number of wins wins the game.
[May the Cards Be with You!]
